title: Homecoming
description: On her way to a new job in Houston, Flo stops off in her hometown, Cowtown, Texas, and ends up buying an old roadhouse.

title: Showdown at the Yellow Rose
description: Earl has to fight a man who's come to get even for having his girlfriend stolen 17 years ago.

title: Happy Birthday, Mama
description: Thanks to Flo, Mama's surprise party turns into a smashing success when an old beau of Mama's shows up.

title: Take My Sister, Please
description: When Flo's prim and proper sister leaves her job at the Department of Motor Vehicles, Flo hires her to work at the bar and it proves a big mistake.

title: The Hero of Flo's Yellow Rose
description: Les is a hero, but his background is a puzzle to Flo and everyone at the Yellow Rose.

title: The Reunion
description: Flo's high school beau returns to Cowtown and makes an offer "to travel the world and have fun" sound very tempting.

title: The Enemy Below
description: A skunk has stationed himself under the Yellow Rose and threatens to put Flo out of business, both professionally and socially.

title: Farley, the People's Choice
description: With Flo's unintentional help, Farley is elected Zoning Commissioner and, much to his disappointment, it is not all it is cracked up to be.

title: Bull Is Back in Town
description: When Bull a wild and crazy miner, comes to town on his annual binge--seeking a good drink, bath and a pretty woman--he goes wild for Flo.

title: So Long, Shorty
description: Funeral services held at Flo's Yellow Rose eulogize the wrong man.

title: Deserted Islands
description: When Randy leaves home, Flo invites him to stay in the back room of the Yellow Rose for a day or two, while he practices his singing. She soon regrets it.

title: The Miracle of Casa de Huevos
description: Flo is disappointed about not attending the Annual Snowflake Ball on Christmas Eve but gets a bigger thrill on Christmas morning.

title: Grey Escape
description: Mama runs away from home when Flo and Fran decide that she should lead a more productive life.

title: Pretty Baby
description: Flo's dream of being crowned "Miss Rodeo Days" is almost spoiled by a seven-month old baby.

title: Not with My Sister, You Don't
description: Flo gets her ABC's mixed up when she tries to alphabetize men to protect little sister Fran (LUCY LEE FLIPPIN).

title: The Price of Avocados: Part 1
description: When Flo can't pay her rent, Farley threatens to take her trailer, but somebody beats him to it. First of a two-part episode.

title: The Price of Avocados: Part 2
description: When it looks like Flo has lost her money and her trailer in a get-rich-quick scheme, her friends make her a winner. Second of a two-part episode.

title: Welcome to the Club
description: Flo fights her way into the local women's club, and teaches its top member how to be a female. BARBARA BABCOCK guest stars as Louise Browning.

title: Gunsmoke at the Yellow Rose
description: Flo fantasizes the Yellow Rose as a roaring saloon in the 1880s.

title: What Are Friends For?
description: Flo's former boss stops in to see her at the Yellow Rose and gives her some unwelcome advice on how to run a business. VIC TAYBACK guest stars as Mel.

title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
description: Flo gets tonsillitis and can't talk and Earl discovers her age through her birth certificate. He figures he's got her where he wants her, until Flo shows him how an old pro plays that game.

title: Footsie
description: When Earl decides to play a game with Flo and a former girlfriend, B.J., he finds out he's in over his head.

title: You Gotta Have Hoyt
description: When Hoyt Axton hits town and visits the Yellow Rose and Flo, he's just in time to get into one of the best fights the saloon ever witnessed.

title: Flo's Encounter of the Third Kind
description: When Flo claims she saw a flying saucer in the desert, she takes a skeptical Earl and Les back there to camp out and wait for the UFO to return.

title: No Men's Land
description: When Buddy, who runs the gas station next to the Yellow Rose, tells Flo that the bathrooms in her saloon are on his land and she'll have to pay for them, Flo calls on the law of the West for justice.

title: The Daynce
description: When Flo makes Earl escort her to the formal ball marking her membership in an exclusive club, he helps her make a big impression, but not the kind she hoped for.
